title: Continuing Education Programme
text: Continuing Education Programme , abbreviated as CEP is a committee of IIT Kharagpur which provides Distance Learning , Short term courses, Conferences/Workshops/Symposiums, Quality Improvement Programme (QIP) and International Summer & Winter Term (ISWT) . The Head of the committee is Prof. Om Prakash Sha, Dean (Continuing Education).

title: Links
text: List of the Short Term Programs offered: http://www.iitkgp.ac.in/topfiles/stc.php Website : http://www.cep.iitkgp.ac.in/
